This endpoint is used to upload PENCOM portion schedule on the system

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"pENCOMPortions":{"description":"An array containing details of PENCOM portions","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"beneficiaryBankName":{"description":"The name of the bank where the beneficiary holds an account","type":"string","example":"Zenith"},"charges":{"description":"The charges applicable to the transaction","type":"string","example":"6.9"},"creditBeneficiaryName":{"description":"The name of the beneficiary receiving the credit","type":"string","example":"LUKUMAN ANIFAT"},"debitAccountName":{"description":"The name of the account holder for the debit account","type":"string","example":"DANIEL AKINLOTAN"},"debitAccountNo":{"description":"The debit account number associated with the transaction","type":"string","example":"20382932823"},"purpose":{"description":"The purpose of the transaction","type":"string","example":"Pension"},"rRR_Code":{"description":"A remita retrival reference code for the transaction","type":"string","example":"1q2w567y"},"serialNum":{"description":"The serial number of the portion","type":"string","example":1},"slip_No":{"description":"The slip number associated with the transaction","type":"string","example":"SL-090"},"totalAmount":{"description":"The total amount including charges","type":"string","example":"20006.9"},"trans_Amount":{"description":"The amount of the transaction","type":"string","example":"20000"},"trans_Particular":{"description":"Particulars of the transaction","type":"string","example":"1q2w3e4r"}}},"example":[{"beneficiaryBankName":"Zenith","charges":"6.9","creditBeneficiaryName":"LUKUMAN ANIFAT","debitAccountName":"DANIEL AKINLOTAN","debitAccountNo":"20382932823","purpose":"Pension","rRR_Code":"1q2w567y","serialNum":"1","slip_No":"SL-090","totalAmount":"20006.9","trans_Amount":"20000","trans_Particular":"1q2w3e4r"}]},"scheduleCode":{"description":"A code representing the schedule","type":"string","example":"sch-009"}}},"examples":{"Upload PENCOM Portion Schedule":{"value":{"pENCOMPortions":[{"beneficiaryBankName":"Zenith","charges":"6.9","creditBeneficiaryName":"LUKUMAN ANIFAT","debitAccountName":"DANIEL AKINLOTAN","debitAccountNo":"20382932823","purpose":"Pension","rRR_Code":"1q2w567y","serialNum":"1","slip_No":"SL-090","totalAmount":"20006.9","trans_Amount":"20000","trans_Particular":"1q2w3e4r"}],"scheduleCode":"sch-009"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
